title:
Series over Bessel functions as series in terms of Riemann's zeta
  function
authors: Slobodan B. Tri\v{c}kovi\'c, Miomir S. Stankovi\'c
abstract:
Relying on the Hurwitz formula, we find sums of the series over sine and
cosine functions through the Hurwitz zeta function. Using another summation
formula for these trigonometric series, we find finite sums of some series over
the Riemann zeta function.
